## SpecMethod.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates an instance of SpecMethod.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(api: apigw.SpecRestApi, httpMethod: string, resourcePath: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  api | apigw.SpecRestApi | the REST API created from the Smithy spec file |
|  httpMethod | string | HTTP method, e.g., GET or POST |
|  resourcePath | string | the API path, e.g., /api/v1/hello |
